00034 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 // Constructor: uvm_phase
00036 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 uvm_phase::uvm_phase(std::string name, uvm_schedule *p_schedule, uvm_phase_type type, uvm_phase_order phase_order) :
00038     _name(name),
00039     _type(type),
00040     _state(UVM_PHASE_DORMANT),
00041     _order(phase_order),
00042     _pschedule(p_schedule)
00043 {
00044     uvm_callback_agent * p_callback_agent;
00045 
00046     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00047     _callback_map[UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START] = p_callback_agent;
00048 
00049     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00050     _callback_map[UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING] = p_callback_agent;
00051 
00052     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00053     _callback_map[UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END] = p_callback_agent;
00054 
00055     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00056     _callback_map[UVM_PHASE_ENDED] = p_callback_agent;
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // Destructor: uvm_phase
00062 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 uvm_phase::~uvm_phase()
00064 {
00065     std::map<uvm_phase_state, uvm_callback_agent*>::iterator it;
00066 
00067     for (it = _callback_map.begin(); it != _callback_map.end(); it++)
00068     {
00069         if (it->second != NULL)
00070             delete it->second;
00071     }
00072     _callback_map.clear();
00073 }

00128 // Parameters:
00129 //   state - state of phase
00130 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 void uvm_phase::set_phase_state(uvm_phase_state state)
00132 {
00133     _state = state;
00134 
00135     if (_state == UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START)
00136         ready_to_start_ev.notify();
00137 }

00163 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 // Function: add_next_phase
00165 //  Add phase that this current phase can move to.
00166 //
00167 // Parameters:
00168 //  phase    - pointer to next phase
00169 //  priority - priority for moving to this phase, current phase will move to
00170 //             the phase with the highest priority when all barriers have
00171 //             been lowered.
00172 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173 void uvm_phase::add_next_phase(uvm_phase* phase, unsigned int priority)
00174 {
00175     _next_phase_map.insert(std::pair<int, uvm_phase*>(priority, phase));
00176 }
00177

00179 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 // Function: get_next_phase
00181 //  Returns the next phase after current phase
00182 //
00183 // Returns:
00184 //  phase    - pointer to next phase
00185 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00186 uvm_phase* uvm_phase::get_next_phase()
00187 {
00188     std::multimap<unsigned int, uvm_phase*>::reverse_iterator rit;
00189     if (_next_phase_map.size() > 0)
00190     {
00191         if (_next_phase_req_map.size() > 0)
00192         {
00193             rit = _next_phase_map.rbegin();
00194             return rit->second;
00195         }
00196         else
00197         {
00198             rit = _next_phase_map.rbegin();
00199             return rit->second;
00200         }
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204         return NULL;
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 // Function: go_to_phase
00210 //  Request to go to a particular phase, after this phase is done
00211 //
00212 // Parameters:
00213 //  phase - pointer to phase to go to 
00214 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 void uvm_phase::go_to_phase(uvm_phase* phase)
00216 {
00217     std::multimap<unsigned int, uvm_phase*>::iterator it;
00218     bool bfound = false;
00219 
00220     it = _next_phase_map.begin();
00221     while (it != _next_phase_map.end() && bfound == false)
00222     {
00223         if (it->second == phase)
00224         {
00225             bfound = true;
00226             _next_phase_req_map.insert(std::pair<int, uvm_phase*>(it->first, it->second));
00227         }
00228         it++;
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00232 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00233 // Function: clear_next_phase_req
00234 //  Clears the next phase request list
00235 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 void uvm_phase::clear_next_phase_req()
00237 {
00238     _next_phase_req_map.clear();
00239 }

00241 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 // Function: execute
00243 //  Execute callback
00244 //
00245 // Parameters:
00246 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00247 void uvm_phase::execute(sc_core::sc_module* pmod)
00248 {
00249     uvm_callback_agent *p_callback_agent;
00250 
00251     if (_type == UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE)
00252         execute_runtime_phase();
00253     else
00254         execute_nonruntime_phase(pmod);
00255 
00256     p_callback_agent = _callback_map[_state];
00257     p_callback_agent->call();
00258 }
00259 
00260 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 // Function: execute_runtime_phase
00262 //
00263 // Parameters:
00264 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00265 void uvm_phase::execute_runtime_phase()
00266 {
00267     uvm_component* pcomp;
00268 
00269     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _comp_callback_vec.size(); i++)
00270     {
00271         pcomp = _comp_callback_vec[i];
00272         if (_state == UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING)
00273             process_state_executing_runtime(pcomp);
00274         else
00275             process_state_non_executing(pcomp);
00276     }
00277 }
00278 
00279 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00280 // Function: execute_nonruntime_phase
00281 //
00282 // Parameters:
00283 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 void uvm_phase::execute_nonruntime_phase(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00285 {
00286     std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> mod_vec;
00287 
00288     if (pmod == NULL)
00289         mod_vec = uvm_get_tops();
00290     else
00291         mod_vec.push_back(pmod);
00292 
00293     for (int i = 0; i < mod_vec.size(); i++)
00294     {
00295         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(mod_vec[i]);
00296 
00297         if (_order == UVM_TOP_DOWN)
00298             execute_topdown_phase(mod_vec[i]);
00299         else
00300             execute_bottomup_phase(mod_vec[i]);
00301 
00302         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00303     }
00304 }
00305 
00306 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00307 // Function: execute_topdown_phase
00308 //
00309 // Parameters:
00310 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00311 void uvm_phase::execute_topdown_phase(sc_core::sc_module *pmod)
00312 {
00313     assert(pmod != NULL);
00314 
00315     std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> child_vec;
00316 
00317     if (_state == UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING)
00318     {
00319         process_state_executing_nonruntime(pmod);
00320     }
00321     else
00322     {
00323         uvm_component * pcomp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod);
00324         process_state_non_executing(pcomp);
00325     }
00326 
00327     // Find child and recursively call child
00328     child_vec = uvm_get_children(pmod);
00329     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_vec.size(); i++)
00330     {
00331         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(child_vec[i]);
00332         execute_topdown_phase(child_vec[i]);
00333         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00334     }
00335 }
00336 
00337 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00338 // Function: execute_bottomup_phase
00339 //
00340 // Parameters:
00341 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00342 void uvm_phase::execute_bottomup_phase(sc_core::sc_module *pmod)
00343 {
00344     assert(pmod != NULL);
00345 
00346     std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> child_vec;
00347 
00348     // Find child and recursively call child
00349     child_vec = uvm_get_children(pmod);
00350     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_vec.size(); i++)
00351     {
00352         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(child_vec[i]);
00353         execute_bottomup_phase(child_vec[i]);
00354         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00355     }
00356 
00357     if (_state == UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING)
00358     {
00359         process_state_executing_nonruntime(pmod);
00360     }
00361     else
00362     {
00363         uvm_component * pcomp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod);
00364         process_state_non_executing(pcomp);
00365     }
00366 }
00367 
00368 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369 // Function: process_state_executing_runtime
00370 //
00371 // Parameters:
00372 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00373 void uvm_phase::process_state_executing_runtime(uvm_component *pcomp)
00374 {
00375     assert(pcomp != NULL);
00376 
00377     sc_process_handle proccess_h;
00378 
00379     // TODO: what should we do about process handle??
00380     //       should we even spawn it?  or let phase_execute spawn it?
00381     proccess_h = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::phase_execute, pcomp, this));
00382 }
00383 
00384 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00385 // Function: process_state_executing_nonruntime
00386 //
00387 // Parameters:
00388 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00389 void uvm_phase::process_state_executing_nonruntime(sc_core::sc_module * pmod)
00390 {
00391     assert(pmod != NULL);
00392 
00393     uvm_component* pcomp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); 
00394     if (pcomp != NULL)
00395       pcomp->phase_execute(this);
00396 }
00397 
00398 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00399 // Function: process_state_non_executing
00400 //
00401 // Parameters:
00402 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00403 void uvm_phase::process_state_non_executing(uvm_component * pcomp)
00404 {
00405     if (pcomp == NULL) return;
00406 
00407     switch(_state)
00408     {
00409     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START:
00410         pcomp->phase_started(this); 
00411         break;
00412     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00413         pcomp->phase_ready_to_end(this); 
00414         break;
00415     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00416         pcomp->phase_ended(this); 
00417         break;
00418     default:
00419         break;
00420     }
00421 }
00422 
00423 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00424 // Function: sync_phase
00425 //  Add synchronization points to this phase
00426 //
00427 // Parameters:
00428 //  phase - phase that this phase will sync to
00429 //  sync_point - which point to sync at (starting phase, or ending phase)
00430 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00431 void uvm_phase::sync_phase(uvm_phase* phase, uvm_sync_point sync_point)
00432 {
00433     if (sync_point == UVM_SYNC_AT_START)
00434         _sync_at_start_phase_vec.push_back(phase);
00435     else
00436         _sync_at_end_phase_vec.push_back(phase);
00437 }
00438 
00439 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00440 // Function: is_ready_to_start
00441 //  Is this phase ready to start?  
00442 //
00443 // Returns:
00444 //  Returns true if this phase is ready to start.  If the phase has already
00445 //  started or has ended (sync point has passed), then it's considered ready 
00446 //  ready to start.
00447 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00448 bool uvm_phase::is_ready_to_start()
00449 {
00450     return (_state != UVM_PHASE_DORMANT);
00451 }
00452 
00453 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00454 // Function: is_ready_to_end
00455 //  Is this phase ready to end?  
00456 //
00457 // Returns:
00458 //  Returns true if this phase is ready to end.
00459 //  barrrier is down for the phase, it's not in the DORMANT, OR READY_TO_START
00460 //  state
00461 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00462 bool uvm_phase::is_ready_to_end()
00463 {
00464     bool bcorrect_state = _state != UVM_PHASE_DORMANT ||
00465                           _state != UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_START ;
00466 
00467     return ( bcorrect_state &&
00468              barrier.get_num_barriers() == 0 );
00469 }
00470 
00471 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00472 // Function: get_callback_agent
00473 //  Returns the pointer to the callback agent of a particular type
00474 //
00475 // Returns:
00476 //  callback_agent* - pointer to the callback agnet
00477 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00478 uvm_callback_agent* uvm_phase::get_callback_agent(uvm_phase_state state)
00479 {
00480     return _callback_map[state];
00481 }

00483 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00484 // Function: register_comp_callback
00485 //  Register component callback to all states of this phase
00486 //
00487 // Parameters:
00488 //  comp* - pointer to the component
00489 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00490 void uvm_phase::register_comp_callback(uvm_component *pcomp)
00491 {
00492     _comp_callback_vec.push_back(pcomp);
00493 }
00494 
00495 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00496 // Function: is_sync_point_ready
00497 //  Check to see if phases that this phase is sync to, is ready to proceese
00498 //
00499 // Parameters:
00500 //  sync_point - sync at start or sync at end
00501 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00502 bool uvm_phase::is_sync_point_ready(uvm_sync_point sync_point)
00503 {
00504     int i;
00505     uvm_phase* pphase;
00506     bool bready = true;
00507 
00508     if (sync_point == UVM_SYNC_AT_START)
00509     {
00510         for (i = 0; i < _sync_at_start_phase_vec.size(); i++)
00511         {
00512             pphase = _sync_at_start_phase_vec[i];
00513             bready = bready && pphase->is_ready_to_start();
00514         }
00515     }
00516     else
00517     {
00518         for (i = 0; i < _sync_at_end_phase_vec.size(); i++)
00519         {
00520             pphase = _sync_at_end_phase_vec[i];
00521             bready == bready && pphase->is_ready_to_end();
00522         }
00523     }
00524 
00525     return bready;
00526 }
00527 
00528 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00529 // Function: wait_ready_to_start()
00530 //  Wait until phase is ready to start - all sync phases are ready to start
00531 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00532 void uvm_phase::wait_ready_to_start()
00533 {
00534     uvm_phase* pphase;
00535 
00536     for (int i = 0; i < _sync_at_start_phase_vec.size(); i++)
00537     {
00538         pphase = _sync_at_start_phase_vec[i];
00539         if (!pphase->is_ready_to_start())
00540             ::sc_core::wait(pphase->ready_to_start_ev);    
00541     }
00542 }
00543 
00544 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00545 // Function: wait_ready_to_end()
00546 //  Wait until phase is ready to end - all sync phases are ready to end
00547 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00548 void uvm_phase::wait_ready_to_end()
00549 {
00550     uvm_phase* pphase;
00551 
00552     for (int i = 0; i < _sync_at_end_phase_vec.size(); i++)
00553     {
00554         pphase = _sync_at_end_phase_vec[i];
00555         if (!pphase->is_ready_to_end())
00556             pphase->barrier.wait();    
00557     }
00558 }
